2. The road is the most slippery:

column2: 3. If it safe to do so, you can pass a vehicle ahead when:

column2: 4. When passing a vehicle,  it is safe to return to your lane when:

column6: you look over your shoulder and see no vehicle behind you.

column2: 5. When turning, drivers should:

column2: 6. To drive defensively, you must:

column2: 7. If the driver of an oncoming vehicle fails to dim the lights, you should look:
column4: toward the center of the roadway.
column6: toward the right side of the road.

column2: 8. Never make a U-turn from:
column8: the left part of the lane nearest to the centerline of the roadway.

column2: 9. Drivers should adjust their rearview and side mirrors:
column6: before they get into the car.

column2: 10. When a school bus is picking up or dropping off children, you must:
